mapper.select: select s.id as id, s.name as name, s.num as num, s.category_id as category_id, c.name as category_name, s.request_user_id as request_user_id, u.name as request_user_name, s.request_dept_id as request_dept_id, d.name as request_dept_name, s.status as status, sta.name as status_name, to_char(s.request_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as request_date, s.note as note from sizai s inner join category c on s.category_id = c.id inner join users u on s.request_user_id = u.id inner join department d on s.request_dept_id = d.id inner join status sta on s.status = sta.code where s.request_date between to_date(#{fromTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{toTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and s.request_user_id = #{request_user_id} order by s.request_date asc, s.id asc
